title: bd CLI SIGSEGV crash on concurrent list operations
description: After running for a few minutes, bd list commands crash with nil pointer dereference in dolt's DoltDB.SetCrashOnFatalError. Exit code 2, SIGSEGV. The backend spawns multiple bd commands (list epics, list tasks, etc.) in parallel, and dolt's SQL engine doesn't handle concurrent connections to the same database safely. Need to investigate and add serialization or connection pooling on the adjutant side.
